level.text: Any violation of the provisions of this chapter shall be grounds for corrective action pursuant to the personnel regulations set forth in 19 DCMR chapter 2.

The sanctions imposed by this section are in addition to, not in lieu of, the sanctions imposed by 5 U.S.C. § 7326, 18 U.S.C. §§ 201, 205, 208 and 209, D.C. Code §§ 1-1461 and 1-1462, or any other applicable law or regulation of the United States or the District of Columbia.
